main: ^Elsaba: My friends name is really weird. What even is a kitsune?
^What do you know about lilac butterfly?
npc: ^Elsaba: thats what he said, but I dont believe you. Theres no way a kitsune is anything.
info: ^Elsaba: I think she took the artefact?
info2: ^Elsaba: Its green and very important to people. Thats all I know
